title: AppLauncher
description: App Launcher Plus is an App Drawer that automatically organize your apps base on google play categories with customizable category groups and more.

title: P2P File Sharing
description: A peer to peer file sharing web app that is a wikiyou page. Allows you to share any files directly to anybody you share your share url with.

title: flickrsmartsync
description: flickrsmartsync is a tool you can use to easily sync up or down your photos in a drive/folder to flickr to sync all your photo collection.
